title: Drew Barrymore: Rewriting The Story | Breaking The Curse | 4
description:
With rehab behind her and a reputation to repair, Drew’s determined to show Hollywood she’s ready to do the work. But as she rebuilds her career and reclaims her place as a Barrymore, she realizes it’s up to her to heal the wounds her family left behind — once and for all.


Binge the full season early and ad free with Wondery+ in the Wondery App. https://wondery.app.link/eventherich


And check out the brand new Even the Rich merch store at wonderyshop.com


Support us by supporting our sponsors!

Jenni Kayne - To find your forever pieces, go to jennikayne.com and use the promo code RICH to get 15% off!
